title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
you have seen this girl. This is nothing to do with me. Goodbye.

Choosing dialogue 3 will put Auntie Ethel in disbelief because you did not defend her. She disappears and you converse with the brothers. You will have the following dialogue options.

Will someone please tell me what's going on? Well, good luck with that.

Choosing dialogue 1 will have the brothers tell you about their sister Mayrina. They mention that she is unwell and taken by Auntie Ethel. You will have the following dialogue
